description.value:
You can @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Lie]{Lie} about having taken an action so convincingly that you acquire all the tangible benefits of having successfully completed it.

You can roll Deception in place of a different skill when attempting to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Earn Income]{Earn Income}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Make an Impression]{Make an Impression}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Request]{Request}, or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Subsist]{Subsist}.

You can use Fabricated Connections to Make an Impression or Request once per day, and you can also use it once per week to Earn Income or Subsist.
